    Navigation

    Required: ./includes/menu.js (for keyboard accessibility)

    <div id="navigation">
  	<ul class="menu">
  		<li class="active"><a href="" class="active">Menu Item 1</a></li>
  		<li><a href="">Menu Item 2</a>
  			<ul class="menu">
  				<li><a href="">Submenu Item 1</a></li>
  				<li><a href="">Submenu Item 2</a></li>
  				<li><a href="">Submenu Item 3</a></li>
  			</ul>
  		</li>
  		<li><a href="">Menu Item 3</a>
  			<ul class="menu">
  				<li><a href="">Submenu Item A</a></li>
  				<li><a href="">Submenu Item B</a></li>
  				<li><a href="">Submenu Item C</a></li>
  			</ul>
  		</li>
  		<li><a href="">Menu Item 4</a></li>
  		<li><a href="">Menu Item 5</a></li>
  	</ul>
  </div>
    • Menu Item 1
    • Menu Item 2
      • Submenu Item 1
      • Submenu Item 2
      • Submenu Item 3
    • Menu Item 3
      • Submenu Item A
      • Submenu Item B
      • Submenu Item C
    • Menu Item 4
    • Menu Item 5
    Sticky

    Required: ./includes/sticky.js

    <div class="make-sticky">
  	<h2>This is a sticky element that is going to hang around for awhile.</h2>
  </div>

    This is a sticky element that is going to hang around for awhile.

    Accordion

  	<h3 class="accordion-trigger"><a href="#"><span class="plus"><i></i></span>This is the accordion title and trigger</a>
  	</h3>
  	<div class="accordion-content">

  	</div>
  </div>

    Carousel

    Required: JQuery

    <ul class="owl-carousel">
  	<li>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Alias aspernatur corporis, eligendi est eveniet ipsa ipsum iusto labore odio quae quam, similique sunt tempora totam ut? Ex nobis quae tempora?</li>
  	<li>Accusamus aspernatur dolore dolores dolorum illum in libero, nemo neque praesentium quas qui sapiente? Ab, cum doloribus eius, hic impedit ipsum laudantium obcaecati quos recusandae repellendus sequi totam voluptatem voluptates?</li>
  	<li>Debitis earum enim impedit labore quis tenetur voluptatum. Atque aut consequatur, debitis dolores eius id laborum mollitia officia praesentium quae reprehenderit tenetur? Accusamus atque dicta eveniet laboriosam nisi sint veniam!</li>
  </ul>
  
  <!-- Required script for carousel -->
  <script src="js/init-carousel.js"></script>
    • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Alias aspernatur corporis, eligendi est eveniet ipsa ipsum iusto labore odio quae quam, similique sunt tempora totam ut? Ex nobis quae tempora?
    • Accusamus aspernatur dolore dolores dolorum illum in libero, nemo neque praesentium quas qui sapiente? Ab, cum doloribus eius, hic impedit ipsum laudantium obcaecati quos recusandae repellendus sequi totam voluptatem voluptates?
    • Debitis earum enim impedit labore quis tenetur voluptatum. Atque aut consequatur, debitis dolores eius id laborum mollitia officia praesentium quae reprehenderit tenetur? Accusamus atque dicta eveniet laboriosam nisi sint veniam!
    Map

    Required: Get an API key from here

    <style>
  	#googlemap,
  	#markercluster {
  		height: 400px;
  		width: auto;
  	}
  </style>
  
  <div id="googlemap"></div>
  
  <p>Marker cluster example:</p>
  <div id="markercluster"></div>
  
  <!-- Required script for map -->
  <script src="js/init-map.js"></script>

    Modal

    Required: JQuery

    <style>
  	#modal-content {
  		display: none;
  	}
  </style>
  <p><a href="#modal-content" class="fancybox">Fancybox link</a></p>
  <div id="modal-content">Some Fancybox content with a <a href="#modal-content">link</a>.</div>
  
  <!-- Required script for modal -->
  <script src="js/init-modal.js"></script>

    <div class="shorten">

  	</p>
  </div>
